definition: helpless/without choice/for lack of better option/grudgingly/willy-nilly/nolens volens/abbr. for 無可奈何|无可奈何[wu2 ke3 nai4 he2]
to have no way out/to have no alternative

sentences.english: You will feel helpless and the transience of life and helpless?
sentences.chinese: 你還會感到生活的無助和生命的無常與無奈嗎？

sentences.english: When it is cloudy, i am cold, impuissant and sad.
sentences.chinese: 只要天氣陰暗，我就會非常的冷漠，無奈，甚至悲傷。

sentences.english: Traders in pet markets in Shenyang experienced the same conditions as Chen.
sentences.chinese: 和陳琦一樣無奈的還有瀋陽市寵物市場的攤主們。

sentences.english: These monopolizations never fail in invalidating the "free market".
sentences.chinese: 這些壟斷總使“自由市場”無奈地失效。

sentences.english: Not being able to stand his ingratiation , I helplessly agreed to his request.
sentences.chinese: 嚅囁我經不住他的死纏硬泡，無奈地答應了他的請求。

sentences.english: Some old people are often condemned to live alone.
sentences.chinese: 一些老人常出於無奈而獨自生活。

sentences.english: In desperation, the husband took out a five-dollar bill and waved it above the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 無奈，丈夫拿出一張五美元的鈔票在人羣上面搖晃晃。

sentences.english: Is stuffy voice"H'm" base, chief executive officer's adult helplessly also has to follow to leave.
sentences.chinese: 悶着聲“嗯”了下，總裁大人無奈的也只好跟着動身。

sentences.english: The man looked up. The dog was still watching him.
sentences.chinese: 他無奈地擡起頭，看見狗正看着他。

sentences.english: The wandering tour saddens the days with sorrow.
sentences.chinese: 無奈流浪的旅程，讓悲傷增添愁苦哀慼的傷痕。

sentences.english: The urban life of high-tempo is permeating with various desire and vainness .
sentences.chinese: 忙碌的都市生活，總是充滿了種種的慾望與無奈。

sentences.english: In desperation, the husband took out a five-dollar bill and waved it above the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 無奈，丈夫拿出一張五美元的鈔票在人羣上面搖晃。

sentences.english: And justs sits there for ages untill i close it and try it again.
sentences.chinese: 只能無奈地坐在那蹉跎歲月，關了又開一試再試。

sentences.english: Helpless, shine on a demon mirror to only have crustily skin of head, skill hold bomb to arrive at before.
sentences.chinese: 無奈，照妖鏡只有硬着頭皮，一手託着炸彈來到陣前。

sentences.english: It is a subject that is treated altogether too lightly by the great majority of people.
sentences.chinese: 無奈大多數的人對這個問題都太鄙棄了。

sentences.english: Argentina's coach Diego Maradona is perplexed in Cape Town.
sentences.chinese: 阿根廷教練迪亞哥馬拉多納在開普敦賽場上充滿無奈。

definition: have no way out/have no alternative/abbr. to 無奈|无奈[wu2 nai4]
but/yet/however/while/to go back/to decline/to retreat/nevertheless/even though
there is nothing to be done/one can't do anything about it
to despair/to give up all hope/desperate/desperation
